mapper.delete:
update zx_sa_other_equip_settle set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and zxSaOtherEquipSettleId in
#{model.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zx_sa_other_equip_settle WHERE del_flag = '0' AND zxCtOtherManageId = #{zxCtOtherManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND period > #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY create_time

SELECT tab.*, t.billNo, t.contractNo, t.secondName FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT eri.equipCode AS equipCode, eri.equipName AS equipName, eri.unit AS unit, eri.contractPrice AS contractPrice, round( eri.contractPrice / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ) AS priceNoTax, round( eri.contractPrice - round( eri.contractPrice / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ), 2 ) AS contractPriceTax, eri.alterPrice AS alterPrice, round( eri.alterPrice / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ) AS alterPriceNoTax, round( eri.alterPrice - round( eri.alterPrice / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ), 2 ) AS alterPriceTax, eri.contractQty AS contractQty, eri.contractAmt AS contractAmt, round( eri.contractAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ) AS contractAmtNoTax, round( eri.contractAmt - round( eri.contractAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ), 2 ) AS contractAmtTax, eri.changedQty AS changeQty, eri.changedAmt AS changeAmt, round( eri.changedAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ) AS changeAmtNoTax, round( eri.changedAmt - round( eri.changedAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ), 2 ) AS changeAmtTax, eri.thisQty AS thisQty, eri.thisAmt AS thisAmt, eri.thisAmtNoTax AS thisAmtNoTax, eri.thisAmtTax AS thisAmtTax, eri.upQty AS upQty, eri.upAmt AS upAmt, round( eri.upAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ) AS upAmtNoTax, round( eri.upAmt - round( eri.upAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ), 2 ) AS upAmtTax, eri.totalQty AS totalQty, eri.totalAmt AS totalAmt, round( eri.totalAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ) AS totalAmtNoTax, round( eri.totalAmt - round( eri.totalAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ), 2 ) AS totalAmtTax, eri.taxRate AS taxRate, ( SELECT CASE WHEN ic.isDeduct = '1' THEN '' ELSE '' END AS isDeduct FROM zx_ct_other_manage ic WHERE ic.zxCtOtherManageId = #{zxCtOtherManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS isDeduct, eri.remark FROM zx_sa_other_equip_settle ea LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle er ON ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = er.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle_item eri ON er.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId = eri.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId WHERE ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = #{zxSaOtherEquipSettleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ea.del_flag = '0' AND eri.del_flag = '0' ) AS tmp UNION ALL SELECT '' AS equipCode, null equipName, null unit, null contractPrice, null priceNoTax, null contractPriceTax, null AS alterPrice, null alterPriceNoTax, null alterPriceTax, sum( eri.contractQty ) contractQty, sum( eri.contractAmt ) contractAmt, round( eri.contractAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ) AS contractAmtNoTax, round( eri.contractAmt - round( eri.contractAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ), 2 ) AS contractAmtTax, sum( eri.changedQty ) changeQty, sum( eri.changedAmt ) changeAmt, round( eri.changedAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ) AS changeAmtNoTax, round( eri.changedAmt - round( eri.changedAmt / ( 1+0.01 * eri.taxRate ), 2 ), 2 ) AS changeAmtTax, sum( eri.thisQty ) thisQty, sum( eri.thisAmt ) thisAmt, sum( eri.thisAmtNoTax ) thisAmtNoTax, sum( eri.thisAmtTax ) thisAmtTax, null upQty, SUM( eri.upAmt ) upAmt, null upAmtNoTax, null upAmtTax, null totalQty, ( SELECT sum( eri.thisAmt ) FROM zx_sa_other_equip_settle ea LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle er ON ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = er.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle_item eri ON er.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId = eri.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId WHERE ea.zxCtOtherManageId = #{zxCtOtherManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) totalAmt, null totalAmtNoTax, null totalAmtTax, null AS taxRate, null AS isDeduct, null AS remark FROM zx_sa_other_equip_settle ea LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle er ON ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = er.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle_item eri ON er.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId = eri.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId WHERE ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = #{zxSaOtherEquipSettleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND eri.del_flag = '0' UNION ALL SELECT '' AS equipCode, null equipName, null unit, null contractPrice, null priceNoTax, null contractPriceTax, null AS alterPrice, null alterPriceNoTax, null alterPriceTax, null contractQty, null AS contractAmt, null contractAmtNoTax, null contractAmtTax, null AS changeQty, null AS changeAmt, null changeAmtNoTax, null changeAmtTax, null thisQty, em.thisAmt AS thisAmt, null thisAmtNoTax, null thisAmtTax, null AS upQty, null upAmt, null upAmtNoTax, null upAmtTax, null AS totalQty, em.totalAmt AS totalAmt, null totalAmtNoTax, null totalAmtTax, null AS taxRate, null AS isDeduct, null AS remark FROM zx_sa_other_equip_settle ea LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_settle_item em ON ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = em.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId WHERE ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = #{zxSaOtherEquipSettleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND em.statisticsType = '100100' AND ea.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY em.thisAmt, em.totalAmt ) tab, zx_sa_other_equip_settle t WHERE t.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = #{zxSaOtherEquipSettleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from zx_sa_other_equip_settle where del_flag = '0' and apih5_flow_status = '2' and contractNo = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by initSerialNumber desc limit 1

SELECT eri.equipCode AS equipCode, eri.equipName AS equipName, eri.unit AS unit, eri.contractPrice AS contractPrice, eri.alterPrice AS alterPrice, eri.contractQty AS contractQty, eri.contractAmt AS contractAmt, eri.changedQty AS changeQty, eri.changedAmt AS changeAmt, eri.thisQty AS thisQty, eri.thisAmt AS thisAmt, eri.upQty AS upQty, eri.upAmt AS upAmt, eri.totalQty AS totalQty, eri.totalAmt AS totalAmt, eri.taxRate AS taxRate, ( SELECT CASE WHEN ic.isDeduct = '1' THEN '' ELSE '' END AS isDeduct FROM zx_ct_other_manage ic WHERE ic.zxCtOtherManageId = #{zxCtOtherManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS isDeduct, eri.remark FROM zx_sa_other_equip_settle ea LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle er ON ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = er.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle_item eri ON er.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId = eri.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId WHERE ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = #{zxSaOtherEquipSettleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ea.del_flag = '0' AND eri.del_flag = '0' UNION ALL SELECT '' AS equipCode, NULL equipName, NULL unit, NULL contractPrice, NULL AS alterPrice, NULL contractQty, sum( eri.contractAmt ) contractAmt, NULL changeQty, sum( eri.changedAmt ) changeAmt, NULL thisQty, er.thisAmt thisAmt, NULL upQty, er.upAmt upAmt, NULL totalQty, er.totalAmt totalAmt, NULL AS taxRate, NULL AS isDeduct, NULL AS remark FROM zx_sa_other_equip_settle ea LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle er ON ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = er.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId LEFT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_res_settle_item eri ON er.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId = eri.zxSaOtherEquipResSettleId WHERE ea.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId = #{zxSaOtherEquipSettleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ea.del_flag = '0' AND eri.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY er.thisAmt,er.upAmt,er.totalAmt

SELECT er.zxSaOtherEquipSettleId, eri.zxSaOtherEquipPaySettleItemId, eri.thisAmtNoTax, eri.thisAmtTax, eri.taxRate, eri.contrType, eri.period, eri.comOrders, eri.zxSaOtherEquipPaySettleId, eri.billNo, eri.zxCtOtherManageId, eri.orderNum, eri.payId, eri.payNo, eri.payType, eri.payName, eri.unit, eri.qty, eri.upQty, eri.price, eri.thisAmt, eri.upAmt, eri.comId, eri.comName, eri.isFixed, eri.remark FROM zx_sa_other_equip_pay_settle er RIGHT JOIN zx_sa_other_equip_pay_settle_item eri ON er.zxSaOtherEquipPaySettleId = eri.zxSaOtherEquipPaySettleId WHERE er.zxCtOtherManageId = #{zxCtOtherManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
